H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
A:Type
R:Lt A
H1:IsOrdinal A R
B:Type
Q:Lt B
H2:IsOrdinal B Q
f:A -> B
is_simulation:IsSimulation f
a:A
x:{b : A & resize_hprop (b < a)}
x_a:=(equiv_resize_hprop (x.1 < a))^-1 x.2:x.1 < a
f
  (simulation_is_minimal f
     ((equiv_resize_hprop (f x.1 < f a))^-1
        (equiv_resize_hprop (f x.1 < f a)
           (simulation_is_hom f
              ((equiv_resize_hprop (x.1 < a))^-1 x.2))))).1 =
f x.1

      
H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
A:Type
R:Lt A
H1:IsOrdinal A R
B:Type
Q:Lt B
H2:IsOrdinal B Q
f:A -> B
is_simulation:IsSimulation f
a:A
x:{b : A & resize_hprop (b < a)}
x_a:=(equiv_resize_hprop (x.1 < a))^-1 x.2:x.1 < a
f
  (simulation_is_minimal f
     (simulation_is_hom f
        ((equiv_resize_hprop (x.1 < a))^-1 x.2))).1 =
f x.1

      exact (snd (simulation_is_minimal f (simulation_is_hom f x_a)).2).
  
H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
A:Type
R:Lt A
H1:IsOrdinal A R
B:Type
Q:Lt B
H2:IsOrdinal B Q
f:A -> B
is_simulation:IsSimulation f
a:A
(fun f0 : (‚Üìa).1 <~> (‚Üì(f a)).1 =>
 forall a0 a' : (‚Üìa).1,
 (‚Üìa).2 a0 a' <-> (‚Üì(f a)).2 (f0 a0) (f0 a'))
  (equiv_adjointify
     (fun x : ‚Üìa =>
      (f x.1;
      let X :=
        fun (A : Type) (IsHProp0 : IsHProp A) =>
        equiv_fun (equiv_resize_hprop A) in
      X (f x.1 < f a)
        (ordinal_relation_is_mere (f x.1) (f a))
        (simulation_is_hom f
           ((equiv_resize_hprop (x.1 < a))^-1 x.2))))
     (fun x : ‚Üì(f a) =>
      let x_fa :=
        (equiv_resize_hprop (x.1 < f a))^-1 x.2 in
      let s := simulation_is_minimal f x_fa in
      (fun (a' : A) (proj2 : (a' < a) * (f a' = x.1))
       =>
       (fun (a'_a : a' < a) (_ : f a' = x.1) =>
        (a'; equiv_resize_hprop (a' < a) a'_a))
         (fst proj2) (snd proj2)) s.1 s.2)
     (fun x : {b : B & resize_hprop (b < f a)} =>
      path_sigma_hprop
        (f
           (simulation_is_minimal f
              ((equiv_resize_hprop (x.1 < f a))^-1 x.2)).1;
        equiv_resize_hprop
          (f
             (simulation_is_minimal f
                ((equiv_resize_hprop (x.1 < f a))^-1
                   x.2)).1 < f a)
          (simulation_is_hom f
             ((equiv_resize_hprop
                 ((simulation_is_minimal f
                     ((equiv_resize_hprop (x.1 < f a))^-1
                        x.2)).1 < a))^-1
                (equiv_resize_hprop
                   ((simulation_is_minimal f
                       ((equiv_resize_hprop
                           (x.1 < f a))^-1 x.2)).1 < a)
                   (fst
                      (simulation_is_minimal f
                         ((equiv_resize_hprop
                             (x.1 < f a))^-1 x.2)).2)))))
        x
        (let __transparent_assert_hypothesis :=
           (equiv_resize_hprop (x.1 < f a))^-1 x.2 in
         snd
           (simulation_is_minimal f
              __transparent_assert_hypothesis).2))
     (fun x : {b : A & resize_hprop (b < a)} =>
      path_sigma_hprop
        ((simulation_is_minimal f
            ((equiv_resize_hprop (f x.1 < f a))^-1
               (equiv_resize_hprop (f x.1 < f a)
                  (simulation_is_hom f
                     ((equiv_resize_hprop (x.1 < a))^-1
                        x.2))))).1;
        equiv_resize_hprop
          ((simulation_is_minimal f
              ((equiv_resize_hprop (f x.1 < f a))^-1
                 (equiv_resize_hprop (f x.1 < f a)
                    (simulation_is_hom f
                       ((equiv_resize_hprop (x.1 < a))^-1
                          x.2))))).1 < a)
          (fst
             (simulation_is_minimal f
                ((equiv_resize_hprop (f x.1 < f a))^-1
                   (equiv_resize_hprop (f x.1 < f a)
                      (simulation_is_hom f
                         ((equiv_resize_hprop
                             (x.1 < a))^-1 x.2))))).2))
        x
        (let __transparent_assert_hypothesis :=
           (equiv_resize_hprop (x.1 < a))^-1 x.2 in
         injective f
           (simulation_is_minimal f
              ((equiv_resize_hprop (f x.1 < f a))^-1
                 (equiv_resize_hprop (f x.1 < f a)
                    (simulation_is_hom f
                       ((equiv_resize_hprop (x.1 < a))^-1
                          x.2))))).1 x.1
           (internal_paths_rew_r (f x.1 < f a)
              ((equiv_resize_hprop (f x.1 < f a))^-1
                 (equiv_resize_hprop (f x.1 < f a)
                    (simulation_is_hom f
                       ((equiv_resize_hprop (x.1 < a))^-1
                          x.2))))
              (simulation_is_hom f
                 ((equiv_resize_hprop (x.1 < a))^-1
                    x.2))
              (fun l : f x.1 < f a =>
               f (simulation_is_minimal f l).1 = f x.1)
              (snd
                 (simulation_is_minimal f
                    (simulation_is_hom f
                       __transparent_assert_hypothesis)).2)
              (eissect
                 (equiv_resize_hprop (f x.1 < f a))
                 (simulation_is_hom f
                    ((equiv_resize_hprop (x.1 < a))^-1
                       x.2)))))))
 
H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
A:Type
R:Lt A
H1:IsOrdinal A R
B:Type
Q:Lt B
H2:IsOrdinal B Q
f:A -> B
is_simulation:IsSimulation f
a:A
forall a0 a' : {b : A & resize_hprop (b < a)},
a0.1 < a'.1 <-> f a0.1 < f a'.1
 
H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
A:Type
R:Lt A
H1:IsOrdinal A R
B:Type
Q:Lt B
H2:IsOrdinal B Q
f:A -> B
is_simulation:IsSimulation f
a, x:A
x_a:resize_hprop (x < a)
y:A
y_a:resize_hprop (y < a)
x < y <-> f x < f y

y_a:resize_hprop (y < a)
x < y -> f x < f y

y_a:resize_hprop (y < a)
x < y -> f x < f y
 apply (simulation_is_hom f).

x < y

H0:PropResizing
A:Type
R:Lt A
H1:IsOrdinal A R
B:Type
Q:Lt B
H2:IsOrdinal B Q
f:A -> B

a':A
a'_y:a' < y
p:f a' = f x
x < y

      
H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing

p:a' = x
x < y
 
H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
A:Type
R:Lt A
H1:IsOrdinal A R
B:Type
Q:Lt B
H2:IsOrdinal B Q
f:A -> B
is_simulation:IsSimulation f
a, x:A
x_a:resize_hprop (x < a)
y:A
y_a:resize_hprop (y < a)
fx_fy:f x < f y
a'_y:x < y
x < y
 exact a'_y.
Qed.



H:Univalence

‚Üì(f a) = ‚Üìa

H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
A:Type
R:Lt A
H1:IsOrdinal A R
B:Type
Q:Lt B
H2:IsOrdinal B Q
f:A -> B
is_simulation:IsSimulation f
a:A
Isomorphism ‚Üì(f a) ‚Üìa
 apply (equiv_initial_segment_simulation f).
Qed.





(** * `Ordinal` is an ordinal *)

Instance lt_Ordinal@{carrier relation +} `{PropResizing}
  : Lt Ordinal@{carrier relation}
  := fun A B => exists b : B, A = ‚Üìb.



H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
is_mere_relation Ordinal lt_Ordinal


H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
is_mere_relation Ordinal lt_Ordinal

  
H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
A, B:Ordinal
IsHProp (lt_Ordinal A B)

  
H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
A, B:Ordinal
forall x y : B, A = ‚Üìx -> A = ‚Üìy -> x = y

  
H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
B:Ordinal
b, b':B
p:‚Üìb = ‚Üìb'
b = b'
 
H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
B:Ordinal
b, b':B
p:‚Üìb = ‚Üìb'
‚Üìb = ‚Üìb'
 exact p.
Qed.


Definition bound
           `{PropResizing}
           {A B : Ordinal} (H : A < B)
  : B
  := H.1.

(* We use this notation to hide the proof of A < B that `bound` takes as an argument *)
Notation "A ‚óÅ B" := (@bound A B _) (at level 70) : Ordinals.


Definition bound_property
           `{PropResizing}
           {A B : Ordinal} (H : A < B)
  : A = ‚Üì(bound H)
  := H.2.



H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
A:Ordinal
a, b:A
a < b <-> ‚Üìa < ‚Üìb

H0:PropResizing
A:Ordinal
a, b:A
a < b <-> ‚Üìa < ‚Üìb

H0:PropResizing
A:Ordinal
a, b:A
a < b -> ‚Üìa < ‚Üìb

H0:PropResizing
A:Ordinal
a, b:A
‚Üìa < ‚Üìb -> a < b

a, b:A
a < b -> ‚Üìa < ‚Üìb

‚Üìa < ‚Üìb
 
H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing

a, b:A

‚Üìa = ‚Üì(in_ a a_b)

    exact (path_initial_segment_simulation out (in_ a a_b)).

      apply bound_property.

    apply initial_segment_property.
Qed.

 exact is_mere_relation_lt_on_Ordinal.

Extensional lt

A = B

A <~> B

H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
A, B:Ordinal
H1:forall c : Ordinal, c < A <-> c < B
(let lt_B :=
   fun a : A =>
   let X := fun c : Ordinal => fst (H1 c) in
   X ‚Üìa (a; 1%path) in
 fun a : A => (H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìa) (lt_B a))
o (let lt_A :=
     fun b : B =>
     let X := fun c : Ordinal => snd (H1 c) in
     X ‚Üìb (b; 1%path) in
   fun b : B => (H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb) (lt_A b)) == idmap
 
H:Univalence

   (fst (H1 ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìx) (snd (H1 ‚Üìx) (x; 1%path))))
      ((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìx) (snd (H1 ‚Üìx) (x; 1%path)); 1%path))) ==
idmap

     fun a : A =>
     let X := fun c : Ordinal => fst (H1 c) in
     X ‚Üìa (a; 1%path) in
   fun a : A => (H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìa) (lt_B a)) == idmap

H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
A, B:Ordinal
H1:forall c : Ordinal, c < A <-> c < B
forall a a' : A,
a < a' <->
equiv_adjointify
  (let lt_B :=
     fun a0 : A =>
     let X := fun c : Ordinal => fst (H1 c) in
     X ‚Üìa0 (a0; 1%path) in
   fun a0 : A => (H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìa0) (lt_B a0))
  (let lt_A :=
     fun b : B =>
     let X := fun c : Ordinal => snd (H1 c) in
     X ‚Üìb (b; 1%path) in
   fun b : B => (H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb) (lt_A b))
  (fun b : ordinal_carrier B =>
   injective initial_segment
     ((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb) (snd (H1 ‚Üìb) (b; 1%path))))
        (fst
           (H1 ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb) (snd (H1 ‚Üìb) (b; 1%path))))
           ((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb) (snd (H1 ‚Üìb) (b; 1%path));
           1%path))) b
     (internal_paths_rew Ordinal
        ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb) (snd (H1 ‚Üìb) (b; 1%path)))
        (fun o : Ordinal => o = ‚Üìb)
        (internal_paths_rew Ordinal ‚Üìb
           (fun o : Ordinal => o = ‚Üìb) 1%path
           ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb) (snd (H1 ‚Üìb) (b; 1%path)))
           (bound_property (snd (H1 ‚Üìb) (b; 1%path))))
        ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb) (snd (H1 ‚Üìb) (b; 1%path))))
            (fst
               (H1
                  ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb)
                      (snd (H1 ‚Üìb) (b; 1%path))))
               ((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb) (snd (H1 ‚Üìb) (b; 1%path));
               1%path)))
        (bound_property
           (fst
              (H1
                 ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb) (snd (H1 ‚Üìb) (b; 1%path))))
              ((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb) (snd (H1 ‚Üìb) (b; 1%path));
              1%path)))))
  (fun a0 : ordinal_carrier A =>
   injective initial_segment
     ((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìa0) (fst (H1 ‚Üìa0) (a0; 1%path))))
        (snd
           (H1
              ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìa0) (fst (H1 ‚Üìa0) (a0; 1%path))))
           ((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìa0) (fst (H1 ‚Üìa0) (a0; 1%path));
           1%path))) a0
     (internal_paths_rew Ordinal
        ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìa0) (fst (H1 ‚Üìa0) (a0; 1%path)))
        (fun o : Ordinal => o = ‚Üìa0)
        (internal_paths_rew Ordinal ‚Üìa0
           (fun o : Ordinal => o = ‚Üìa0) 1%path
           ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìa0) (fst (H1 ‚Üìa0) (a0; 1%path)))
           (bound_property (fst (H1 ‚Üìa0) (a0; 1%path))))
        ‚Üì((H0
           ‚óÅ ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìa0) (fst (H1 ‚Üìa0) (a0; 1%path))))
            (snd
               (H1
                  ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìa0)
                      (fst (H1 ‚Üìa0) (a0; 1%path))))
               ((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìa0) (fst (H1 ‚Üìa0) (a0; 1%path));
               1%path)))
        (bound_property
           (snd
              (H1
                 ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìa0)
                     (fst (H1 ‚Üìa0) (a0; 1%path))))
              ((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìa0) (fst (H1 ‚Üìa0) (a0; 1%path));
              1%path))))) a <
equiv_adjointify
  (let lt_B :=
     fun a0 : A =>
     let X := fun c : Ordinal => fst (H1 c) in
     X ‚Üìa0 (a0; 1%path) in
   fun a0 : A => (H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìa0) (lt_B a0))
  (let lt_A :=
     fun b : B =>
     let X := fun c : Ordinal => snd (H1 c) in
     X ‚Üìb (b; 1%path) in
   fun b : B => (H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb) (lt_A b))
  (fun b : ordinal_carrier B =>
   injective initial_segment
     ((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb) (snd (H1 ‚Üìb) (b; 1%path))))

           (H1 ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb) (snd (H1 ‚Üìb) (b; 1%path))))
           ((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb) (snd (H1 ‚Üìb) (b; 1%path));
           1%path))) b
     (internal_paths_rew Ordinal
        ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb) (snd (H1 ‚Üìb) (b; 1%path)))
        (fun o : Ordinal => o = ‚Üìb)
        (internal_paths_rew Ordinal ‚Üìb
           (fun o : Ordinal => o = ‚Üìb) 1%path
           ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb) (snd (H1 ‚Üìb) (b; 1%path)))
           (bound_property (snd (H1 ‚Üìb) (b; 1%path))))
        ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb) (snd (H1 ‚Üìb) (b; 1%path))))
            (fst
               (H1
                  ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb)
                      (snd (H1 ‚Üìb) (b; 1%path))))
               ((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb) (snd (H1 ‚Üìb) (b; 1%path));
               1%path)))
        (bound_property
           (fst
              (H1
                 ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb) (snd (H1 ‚Üìb) (b; 1%path))))
              ((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìb) (snd (H1 ‚Üìb) (b; 1%path));
              1%path)))))
  (fun a0 : ordinal_carrier A =>
   injective initial_segment
     ((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìa0) (fst (H1 ‚Üìa0) (a0; 1%path))))

              ‚Üì((H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìa0) (fst (H1 ‚Üìa0) (a0; 1%path))))

              1%path))))) a'

H0:PropResizing
A, B:Ordinal
H1:forall c : Ordinal, c < A <-> c < B

a < a' <->

(H0 ‚óÅ ‚Üìa') (fst (H1 ‚Üìa') (a'; 1%path))

(* This is analogous to the set-theoretic statement that an ordinal is the set of all smaller ordinals. *)

H:PropResizing
H0:Univalence
B:Ordinal
Isomorphism B ‚ÜìB

H0:Univalence
B:Ordinal
Isomorphism B ‚ÜìB

B.1 <~> (‚ÜìB).1

H:PropResizing
H0:Univalence
B:Ordinal
(fun b : B =>
 (‚Üìb;
 let X :=
   fun (A : Type) (IsHProp0 : IsHProp A) =>
   equiv_fun (equiv_resize_hprop A) in
 X (‚Üìb < B) (ordinal_relation_is_mere ‚Üìb B)
   (b; 1%path)))

   (fun (C : Ordinal) (HC : resize_hprop (C < B)) =>
    let HC0 := (equiv_resize_hprop (C < B))^-1 HC in
    (H ‚óÅ C) HC0) X.1 X.2) == idmap

H:PropResizing
H0:Univalence
B:Ordinal
(fun X : ‚ÜìB =>

  let HC0 := (equiv_resize_hprop (C < B))^-1 HC in
  (H ‚óÅ C) HC0) X.1 X.2)

H0:Univalence

H:PropResizing
H0:Univalence
B:Ordinal
(fun f : B.1 <~> (‚ÜìB).1 =>
 forall a a' : B.1, B.2 a a' <-> (‚ÜìB).2 (f a) (f a'))
  (equiv_adjointify
     (fun b : B =>
      (‚Üìb;
      let X :=
        fun (A : Type) (IsHProp0 : IsHProp A) =>
        equiv_fun (equiv_resize_hprop A) in
      X (‚Üìb < B) (ordinal_relation_is_mere ‚Üìb B)
        (b; 1%path)))
     (fun X : ‚ÜìB =>
      (fun (C : Ordinal) (HC : resize_hprop (C < B))
       =>
       let HC0 := (equiv_resize_hprop (C < B))^-1 HC
         in
       (H ‚óÅ C) HC0) X.1 X.2)
     (fun x : {b : Ordinal & resize_hprop (b < B)} =>
      (fun (C : Ordinal) (HC : resize_hprop (C < B))
       =>
       path_sigma_hprop
         (‚Üì((H ‚óÅ C)
              ((equiv_resize_hprop (C < B))^-1 HC));
         equiv_resize_hprop
           (‚Üì((H ‚óÅ C)
                ((equiv_resize_hprop (C < B))^-1 HC)) <
            B)
           ((H ‚óÅ C)
              ((equiv_resize_hprop (C < B))^-1 HC);
           1%path)) (C; HC)
         (bound_property
            ((equiv_resize_hprop (C < B))^-1 HC))^)
        x.1 x.2)
     (fun x : ordinal_carrier B =>
      internal_paths_rew_r (‚Üìx < B)
        ((equiv_resize_hprop (‚Üìx < B))^-1
           (equiv_resize_hprop (‚Üìx < B) (x; 1%path)))
        (x; 1%path) (fun l : ‚Üìx < B => (H ‚óÅ ‚Üìx) l = x)
        1%path
        (eissect (equiv_resize_hprop (‚Üìx < B))
           (x; 1%path))))
 
H:PropResizing
H0:Univalence
B:Ordinal
forall a a' : ordinal_carrier B, a < a' <-> ‚Üìa < ‚Üìa'
 
H:PropResizing
H0:Univalence
B:Ordinal
b, b':ordinal_carrier B
b < b' <-> ‚Üìb < ‚Üìb'
 apply isembedding_initial_segment.
Qed.





(** * Ordinal successor *)


A:Ordinal
Ordinal


A:Ordinal
Ordinal

  
A:Ordinal
carrier:=(A + Unit)%type:Type
Ordinal

  
A:Ordinal
carrier:=(A + Unit)%type:Type
relation:=fun x y : carrier =>
match x with
| inl x0 =>
    match y with
    | inl y0 => x0 < y0
    | inr _ => Unit
    end
| inr _ =>
    match y with
    | inl _ | _ => Empty
    end
end:carrier -> carrier -> Type
Ordinal

  
A:Ordinal
carrier:=(A + Unit)%type:Type
relation:=fun x y : carrier =>
match x with
| inl x0 =>
    match y with
    | inl y0 => x0 < y0
    | inr _ => Unit
    end
| inr _ =>
    match y with
    | inl _ | _ => Empty
    end
end:carrier -> carrier -> Type
IsOrdinal carrier lt
 
A:Ordinal
carrier:=(A + Unit)%type:Type
relation:=fun x y : carrier =>
match x with
| inl x0 =>
    match y with
    | inl y0 => x0 < y0
    | inr _ => Unit
    end
| inr _ =>
    match y with
    | inl _ | _ => Empty
    end
end:carrier -> carrier -> Type
IsHSet carrier
A:Ordinal
carrier:=(A + Unit)%type:Type
relation:=fun x y : carrier =>
match x with
| inl x0 =>
    match y with
    | inl y0 => x0 < y0
    | inr _ => Unit
    end
| inr _ =>
    match y with
    | inl _ | _ => Empty
    end
end:carrier -> carrier -> Type
is_mere_relation carrier lt
A:Ordinal
carrier:=(A + Unit)%type:Type
relation:=fun x y : carrier =>
match x with
| inl x0 =>
    match y with
    | inl y0 => x0 < y0
    | inr _ => Unit
    end
| inr _ =>
    match y with
    | inl _ | _ => Empty
    end
end:carrier -> carrier -> Type
Extensional lt
A:Ordinal
carrier:=(A + Unit)%type:Type
relation:=fun x y : carrier =>
match x with
| inl x0 =>
    match y with
    | inl y0 => x0 < y0
    | inr _ => Unit
    end
| inr _ =>
    match y with
    | inl _ | _ => Empty
    end
end:carrier -> carrier -> Type
WellFounded lt

A:Ordinal

x, z:A
Unit -> Empty -> x < z

    intros _ [].
Defined.



H:Univalence
A:Ordinal
H0:PropResizing
A < successor A


H:Univalence
A:Ordinal
H0:PropResizing
A < successor A

  
H:Univalence
A:Ordinal
H0:PropResizing
A = ‚Üì(inr tt)

  
H:Univalence
A:Ordinal
H0:PropResizing
A <~> ‚Üì(inr tt)
H:Univalence
A:Ordinal
H0:PropResizing
forall a a' : A, a < a' <-> ?f a < ?f a'

  
H:Univalence
A:Ordinal
H0:PropResizing
A <~> ‚Üì(inr tt)
 
H:Univalence
A:Ordinal
H0:PropResizing
A -> ‚Üì(inr tt)
H:Univalence
A:Ordinal
H0:PropResizing
‚Üì(inr tt) -> A
H:Univalence
A:Ordinal
H0:PropResizing
?f o ?g == idmap
H:Univalence
A:Ordinal
H0:PropResizing
?g o ?f == idmap

    
H:Univalence
A:Ordinal
H0:PropResizing
A -> ‚Üì(inr tt)
 
H:Univalence
A:Ordinal
H0:PropResizing
a:A
‚Üì(inr tt)
 
H:Univalence

successor A

H:Univalence
A:Ordinal
H0:PropResizing
(fun a : A => in_ (inl a) tt)
o (fun X : ‚Üì(inr tt) =>
   (fun proj1 : successor A =>
    match
      proj1 as s
      return (resize_hprop (s < inr tt) -> A)
    with
    | inl a =>
        (fun (a0 : A)
           (_ : resize_hprop (inl a0 < inr tt)) => a0)
          a
    | inr b =>
        (fun u : Unit =>
         match
           u as u0
           return
             (resize_hprop (inr u0 < inr tt) -> A)
         with
         | tt =>
             fun Ha : resize_hprop (inr tt < inr tt)
             =>
             let X0 :=
               fun (A : Type) (IsHProp0 : IsHProp A)
               => equiv_isequiv (equiv_resize_hprop A)
               in
             let X1 :=
               fun (A : Type) (IsHProp0 : IsHProp A)
               => (equiv_resize_hprop A)^-1 in
             let Ha0 := X1 Empty hprop_Empty Ha in
             match Ha0 return (ordinal_carrier A) with
             end
         end) b
    end) X.1 X.2) == idmap

        (equiv_resize_hprop A)^-1 in

H:Univalence
A:Ordinal
H0:PropResizing
(fun X : ‚Üì(inr tt) =>
 (fun proj1 : successor A =>
  match
    proj1 as s return (resize_hprop (s < inr tt) -> A)
  with
  | inl a =>
      (fun (a0 : A)
         (_ : resize_hprop (inl a0 < inr tt)) => a0) a
  | inr b =>
      (fun u : Unit =>
       match
         u as u0
         return (resize_hprop (inr u0 < inr tt) -> A)
       with
       | tt =>
           fun Ha : resize_hprop (inr tt < inr tt) =>
           let X0 :=
             fun (A : Type) (IsHProp0 : IsHProp A) =>
             equiv_isequiv (equiv_resize_hprop A) in
           let X1 :=
             fun (A : Type) (IsHProp0 : IsHProp A) =>
             (equiv_resize_hprop A)^-1 in
           let Ha0 := X1 Empty hprop_Empty Ha in

           end
       end) b
  end) X.1 X.2) o (fun a : A => in_ (inl a) tt) ==
idmap
 
H:Univalence
A:Ordinal
H0:PropResizing
a:A
match
  (in_ (inl a) tt).1 as s
  return (resize_hprop (s < inr tt) -> A)
with
| inl a => fun _ : resize_hprop (inl a < inr tt) => a
| inr b =>
    match
      b as u
      return (resize_hprop (inr u < inr tt) -> A)
    with
    | tt =>
        fun Ha : resize_hprop (inr tt < inr tt) =>
        let X :=
          fun (A : Type) (IsHProp0 : IsHProp A) =>
          equiv_isequiv (equiv_resize_hprop A) in
        let X0 :=
          fun (A : Type) (IsHProp0 : IsHProp A) =>
          (equiv_resize_hprop A)^-1 in
        let Ha0 := X0 Empty hprop_Empty Ha in
        match Ha0 return (ordinal_carrier A) with
        end
    end
end (in_ (inl a) tt).2 = a
 reflexivity.
  
H:Univalence
A:Ordinal
H0:PropResizing
forall a a' : A,
a < a' <->
equiv_adjointify (fun a0 : A => in_ (inl a0) tt)
  (fun X : ‚Üì(inr tt) =>
   (fun proj1 : successor A =>
    match
      proj1 as s
      return (resize_hprop (s < inr tt) -> A)
    with
    | inl a0 =>
        (fun (a1 : A)
           (_ : resize_hprop (inl a1 < inr tt)) => a1)
          a0
    | inr b =>
        (fun u : Unit =>
         match
           u as u0
           return
             (resize_hprop (inr u0 < inr tt) -> A)
         with
         | tt =>
             fun Ha : resize_hprop (inr tt < inr tt)
             =>
             let X0 :=
               fun (A : Type) (IsHProp0 : IsHProp A)
               => equiv_isequiv (equiv_resize_hprop A)
               in
             let X1 :=
               fun (A : Type) (IsHProp0 : IsHProp A)
               => (equiv_resize_hprop A)^-1 in
             let Ha0 := X1 Empty hprop_Empty Ha in
             match Ha0 return (ordinal_carrier A) with
             end
         end) b
    end) X.1 X.2)
  (fun x : ‚Üì(inr tt) =>
   (fun proj1 : successor A =>
    match
      proj1 as s
      return
        (forall proj2 : resize_hprop (s < inr tt),
         in_
           (inl
              (match s as s0 return (... -> A) with
               | inl a0 =>
                   fun _ : resize_hprop ... => a0
               | inr b =>
                   match b as u return ... with
                   | tt => fun ... => ... ...
                   end
               end proj2)) tt = (s; proj2))
    with
    | inl a0 =>
        (fun (a1 : A)
           (Ha : resize_hprop (inl a1 < inr tt)) =>
         ap11 1
           (let X := ishprop_resize_hprop Unit in
            path_ishprop (equiv_resize_hprop Unit tt)
              Ha)) a0
    | inr b =>
        (fun u : Unit =>
         match
           u as u0
           return
             (forall
              proj2 : resize_hprop (inr u0 < inr tt),
              in_ (inl (...
                        ...
                        end proj2)) tt =
              (inr u0; proj2))
         with
         | tt =>
             fun Ha : resize_hprop (inr tt < inr tt)
             =>
             let l :=
               (equiv_resize_hprop (inr tt < inr tt))^-1
                 Ha in
             match
               l
               return
                 (in_ (inl ...) tt = (inr tt; Ha))
             with
             end
         end) b
    end) x.1 x.2) (fun a0 : A => 1%path) a <
equiv_adjointify (fun a0 : A => in_ (inl a0) tt)
  (fun X : ‚Üì(inr tt) =>
   (fun proj1 : successor A =>
    match
      proj1 as s
      return (resize_hprop (s < inr tt) -> A)
    with
    | inl a0 =>
        (fun (a1 : A)
           (_ : resize_hprop (inl a1 < inr tt)) => a1)
          a0
    | inr b =>
        (fun u : Unit =>
         match
           u as u0
           return
             (resize_hprop (inr u0 < inr tt) -> A)
         with
         | tt =>
             fun Ha : resize_hprop (inr tt < inr tt)
             =>
             let X0 :=
               fun (A : Type) (IsHProp0 : IsHProp A)
               => equiv_isequiv (equiv_resize_hprop A)
               in
             let X1 :=
               fun (A : Type) (IsHProp0 : IsHProp A)
               => (equiv_resize_hprop A)^-1 in
             let Ha0 := X1 Empty hprop_Empty Ha in
             match Ha0 return (ordinal_carrier A) with
             end
         end) b
    end) X.1 X.2)
  (fun x : ‚Üì(inr tt) =>
   (fun proj1 : successor A =>
    match
      proj1 as s
      return
        (forall proj2 : resize_hprop (s < inr tt),
         in_
           (inl
              (match s as s0 return (... -> A) with
               | inl a0 =>
                   fun _ : resize_hprop ... => a0
               | inr b =>
                   match b as u return ... with
                   | tt => fun ... => ... ...
                   end
               end proj2)) tt = (s; proj2))
    with
    | inl a0 =>
        (fun (a1 : A)
           (Ha : resize_hprop (inl a1 < inr tt)) =>
         ap11 1
           (let X := ishprop_resize_hprop Unit in
            path_ishprop (equiv_resize_hprop Unit tt)
              Ha)) a0
    | inr b =>
        (fun u : Unit =>
         match
           u as u0

             (forall
              proj2 : resize_hprop (inr u0 < inr tt),
              in_ (inl (...
                        ...
                        end proj2)) tt =
              (inr u0; proj2))
         with
         | tt =>
             fun Ha : resize_hprop (inr tt < inr tt)
             =>
             let l :=
               (equiv_resize_hprop (inr tt < inr tt))^-1
                 Ha in
             match
               l
               return
                 (in_ (inl ...) tt = (inr tt; Ha))
             with
             end
         end) b
    end) x.1 x.2) (fun a0 : A => 1%path) a'
 
H:Univalence
A:Ordinal
H0:PropResizing
forall a a' : ordinal_carrier A, a < a' <-> a < a'
 
H:Univalence
A:Ordinal
H0:PropResizing
a, a':ordinal_carrier A
a < a' <-> a < a'
 reflexivity.
Qed.




(** * Ordinal limit *)

Definition image@{i j} {A : Type@{i}} {B : HSet@{j}} (f : A -> B) : Type@{i}
  := quotient (fun a a' : A => f a = f a').

Definition factor1 {A} {B : HSet} (f : A -> B)
  : A -> image f
  := Quotient.class_of _.


A:Type
B:HSet
f:A -> B
P:image f -> Type
H:forall x : image f, IsHProp (P x)
(forall a : A, P (factor1 f a)) ->
forall x : image f, P x


A:Type
B:HSet
f:A -> B
P:image f -> Type
H:forall x : image f, IsHProp (P x)
(forall a : A, P (factor1 f a)) ->
forall x : image f, P x

  
A:Type
B:HSet
f:A -> B
P:image f -> Type
H:forall x : image f, IsHProp (P x)
step:forall a : A, P (factor1 f a)
forall x : image f, P x

  
A:Type
B:HSet
f:A -> B
P:image f -> Type
H:forall x : image f, IsHProp (P x)
step:forall a : A, P (factor1 f a)
a:A
P (class_of (fun a a' : A => f a = f a') a)

  apply step.
Qed.

Definition image_rec {A} {B : HSet} (f : A -> B)
      {C : HSet} (step : A -> C)
  : (forall a a', f a = f a' -> step a = step a')
    -> image f -> C
  := quotient_rec _ step.



Definition factor2 {A} {B : HSet} (f : A -> B)
  : image f -> B
  := quotient_rec _ f (fun a a' fa_fa' => fa_fa').


H:Funext
A:Type
B:HSet
f:A -> B
IsInjective (factor2 f)


H:Funext
A:Type
B:HSet
f:A -> B
IsInjective (factor2 f)

  
H:Funext
A:Type
B:HSet
f:A -> B
forall x y : quotient (fun a a' : A => f a = f a'),
factor2 f x = factor2 f y -> x = y

  
H:Funext
A:Type
B:HSet
f:A -> B
x:A
forall y : quotient (fun a a' : A => f a = f a'),
f x = factor2 f y ->
class_of (fun a a' : A => f a = f a') x = y

  
H:Funext
A:Type
B:HSet
f:A -> B
x, y:A
f x = f y ->
class_of (fun a a' : A => f a = f a') x =
class_of (fun a a' : A => f a = f a') y

  rapply related_classes_eq.
Qed.



H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
X:Type
F:X -> Ordinal
Ordinal


H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
X:Type
F:X -> Ordinal
Ordinal

  
H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
X:Type
F:X -> Ordinal
f:=fun x : {i : X & F i} => ‚Üìx.2:{i : X & F i} -> Ordinal
Ordinal

  
H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
X:Type
F:X -> Ordinal
f:=fun x : {i : X & F i} => ‚Üìx.2:{i : X & F i} -> Ordinal
carrier:=image f : Type:Type
Ordinal

H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
X:Type
F:X -> Ordinal
f:=fun x : {i : X & F i} => ‚Üìx.2:{i : X & F i} -> Ordinal
carrier:=image f : Type:Type
relation:=fun A B : carrier =>
resize_hprop (factor2 f A < factor2 f B)
:
Type:carrier -> carrier -> Type
a:{i : X & ordinal_carrier (F i)}
B:Ordinal
B_fa:B < f a
{a' : image f &
((a' < factor1 f a) * (factor2 f a' = B))%type}

      
H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
X:Type
F:X -> Ordinal
f:=fun x : {i : X & F i} => ‚Üìx.2:{i : X & F i} -> Ordinal
carrier:=image f : Type:Type
relation:=fun A B : carrier =>
resize_hprop (factor2 f A < factor2 f B)
:
Type:carrier -> carrier -> Type
a:{i : X & ordinal_carrier (F i)}
B:Ordinal
B_fa:B < f a
((factor1 f (a.1; out ((H0 ‚óÅ B) B_fa)) < factor1 f a) *
 (factor2 f (factor1 f (a.1; out ((H0 ‚óÅ B) B_fa))) = B))%type
 
H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
X:Type
F:X -> Ordinal
f:=fun x : {i : X & F i} => ‚Üìx.2:{i : X & F i} -> Ordinal
carrier:=image f : Type:Type
relation:=fun A B : carrier =>
resize_hprop (factor2 f A < factor2 f B)
:
Type:carrier -> carrier -> Type
a:{i : X & ordinal_carrier (F i)}
B:Ordinal
B_fa:B < f a
((factor1 f (a.1; out ((H0 ‚óÅ B) B_fa)) < factor1 f a) *
 (f (a.1; out ((H0 ‚óÅ B) B_fa)) = B))%type

a:{i : X & ordinal_carrier (F i)}
B:Ordinal
B_fa:B < f a
(resize_hprop (‚Üì(out ((H0 ‚óÅ B) B_fa)) < ‚Üìa.2) *
 (‚Üì(out ((H0 ‚óÅ B) B_fa)) = B))%type

H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
X:Type

H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
X:Type
F:X -> Ordinal
f:=fun x : {i : X & F i} => ‚Üìx.2:{i : X & F i} -> Ordinal
carrier:=image f : Type:Type
relation:=fun A B : carrier =>
resize_hprop (factor2 f A < factor2 f B)
:
Type:carrier -> carrier -> Type
a:{i : X & ordinal_carrier (F i)}
B:Ordinal
B_fa:B < f a
B = B
 reflexivity.
Defined.




Instance le_on_Ordinal : Le Ordinal :=
  fun A B => exists f : A -> B, IsSimulation f.



H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
X:Type
F:X -> Ordinal
forall x : X, F x ‚â§ limit F


H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
X:Type
F:X -> Ordinal
forall x : X, F x ‚â§ limit F

  
H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
X:Type
F:X -> Ordinal
forall x : X, F x ‚â§ limit F

  
H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
X:Type
F:X -> Ordinal
x:X
F x ‚â§ limit F
 
H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
X:Type
F:X -> Ordinal
x:X
{f : F x -> limit F & IsSimulation f}

  
H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
X:Type
F:X -> Ordinal
x:X
IsSimulation
  (fun u : F x =>
   factor1 (fun x : {i : X & F i} => ‚Üìx.2) (x; u))

  
H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
X:Type
F:X -> Ordinal
x:X

a < a' ->
factor1 (fun x : {i : X & F i} => ‚Üìx.2) (x; a) <
factor1 (fun x : {i : X & F i} => ‚Üìx.2) (x; a')
H:Univalence
H0:PropResizing
X:Type
F:X -> Ordinal
x:X

b < factor1 (fun x : {i : X & F i} => ‚Üìx.2) (x; a) ->
hexists
  (fun a' : F x =>
   ((a' < a) *
    (factor1 (fun x : {i : X & F i} => ‚Üìx.2) (x; a') =
     b))%type)

 apply bound_property.
Qed.
